title: The Singles Project
description: The Singles Project follows a group of young, successful New York singles as they search for love and live it up in the city that never sleeps. Marking the network's first foray into real-time docu-drama production, each episode will be shot and aired within the same week.
details: {"Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Producers": ["Jennifer Baker", "Nyree Berry", "Tyesha Brown", "Rich Bye", "Sezin Cavusoglu", "Byron Clear", "Harriet Dormer", "Genna Gibson", "Phil Harris", "Westley Harris"]}
subtitle: Season 1
